select a.headid as "headid", a.billno as "billno", a.dodate as "dodate", a.out_org_id as "outOrgId", a.in_org_id as "inOrgId", a.sum_count as "sumCount", a.sum_weight as "sumWeight", a.create_id as "createId", a.create_date as "createDate", a.update_id as "updateId", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.status as "status" from jat_move_head a where a.status in (1,2) and a.create_id = #userId#
order by a.BILLNO desc limit $start$, $limit$
select count(1) from jat_move_head a where a.status in (1,2) and a.create_id = #userId#
select a.orna_code as "ornaCode", a.orna_dsc as "ornaDsc", a.weight as "weight", a.org_id as "orgId", a.status as "status" from jat_bd_orna a where a.orna_code = #ornaCode#
select a.orna_code from jat_bd_orna a where a.status <> 1 and a.orna_code in ($value$)
sqlMap.insert:
insert into jat_move_head(billno, dodate, out_org_id, in_org_id, memo, create_date, create_id, update_date, update_id, status) values(#billno#, #dodate#, #outOrgId#, #inOrgId#, #memo#, #createDate#, #createId#, #updateDate#, #updateId#, #status#)
SELECT last_insert_id() as headid
sqlMap.update: update jat_move_head a set a.dodate = #dodate# , a.in_org_id = #inOrgId#, a.memo = #memo#, a.update_date = #updateDate#, a.update_id = #updateId#, a.status = #status# where a.headid = #headid#
sqlMap.insert: insert into jat_move_line(headid, orna_code, orna_dsc, weight, create_date, create_id, update_date, update_id, status) select #headid#, #ornaCode#, a.orna_dsc, a.weight, #date#, #userid#, #date#, #userid#, #status# from jat_bd_orna a where a.orna_code = #ornaCode#
sqlMap.update: update jat_move_head a, jat_move_line set a.sum_count = ( select count(1) from jat_move_line b where a.headid = b.headid ), a.sum_weight = ( select sum(b.weight) from jat_move_line b where a.headid = b.headid ), a.update_date = #date#, a.update_id = #userid# where a.headid = #headid#
sqlMap.delete: delete from jat_move_line where orna_code = #ornaCode# and headid = #headid#
sqlMap.select: select a.lineid as "lineid", a.orna_code as "ornaCode", a.orna_dsc as "ornaDsc", a.weight as "weight", a.status as "status", substr(a.create_date, 1, 10) as "createDate" from jat_move_line a where a.headid = #headid# order by a.orna_dsc
